name: Pay With Split Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a buy now pay later platform designed to change the way people finance their purchases. The company's platform integrates with websites or applications to give people the ability to split their costs and manage them through installment payments, enabling businesses to offer their customers the choice of paying in interest-free installments.
